physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bilateral sensorineural hearing loss confirmed. No signs of neuromuscular disease including diabetic neuropathy.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Hemoglobin level of 137 g/L, leukocyte count of 5.8 x 10^9 cells/L, platelet count of 5.0 x 10^9 cells/L.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient presented with petechiae over her body and palate. No splenomegaly or hepatomegaly noted. Flow cytometry showed normal CD4-CD8 ratio.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Platelet count improved to 298.0 x 10^9 cells/L within 1 week after discontinuing losartan and starting prednisone.
